amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting access to maternal and pediatric health care through Medicaid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 407 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 72.
